trans-unit.source: Exposes the synchronous enumerator, which supports a simple iteration over a collection of a specified type using blocking synchronous calls.
trans-unit.target: Exposes the synchronous enumerator, which supports a simple iteration over a collection of a specified type using blocking synchronous calls.

trans-unit.source: Also exposes an asynchronous enumerator, which supports an asynchronous pattern of enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Also exposes an asynchronous enumerator, which supports an asynchronous pattern of enumeration.

trans-unit.source: Each enumerator fetches the collection from the server.
trans-unit.target: Each enumerator fetches the collection from the server.

trans-unit.source: As a consequence, each enumerator can see different data (collection size, contents, etc.).
trans-unit.target: As a consequence, each enumerator can see different data (collection size, contents, etc.).

trans-unit.source: Care should be taken to avoid multiple retrievals of the data from the server via casual use of "foreach" and other collection operations.
trans-unit.target: Care should be taken to avoid multiple retrievals of the data from the server via casual use of "foreach" and other collection operations.

trans-unit.source: If concurrent server-side changes to the collection are not expected or relevant, please consider caching the data locally via List.AddRange() or other collection techniques.
trans-unit.target: If concurrent server-side changes to the collection are not expected or relevant, please consider caching the data locally via List.AddRange() or other collection techniques.

trans-unit.source: The type of objects to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: The type of objects to enumerate.
